text: The Calf of Flotta is a small island in Scapa Flow, Orkney. The Calf is next to Flotta, with "Calf" deriving from Old Norse/Norn and meaning a smaller island by a larger one. ==Geography and geology== The Calf is made of red sandstone. It is approximately long, and is thin in shape, orientated west- east. ==References== Category:Calves (islands) Category:Uninhabited islands of Orkney
title: Calf of Flotta
